title: Mastery
body:
I have gotten lv 5 on tryndamere and aatrox in both cases in a game where i got an s- or higher.after i finished the game as usual i got the lv 5 animation and it said i was granted a lv 6 mastery on both of them.when i looked into my hextech crafting tab there was no token to be found.


I recall this happening a while ago but i don't know what exactly happend

Is this a bug or this is just how it is

replies.body: You need to already be level 5 at the start of the match to be eligible for tokens, per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  It's not possible to reach level 5 and obtain a token in the same game.  The notification toatst that appears is an introduction notification about the token system, and not that you were rewarded one.  Let me know if that clears things up!
